txt.en: The Dead Marshes lie just beyond the Noman-lands, a cursed place where the fallen of a great battle still rest. The vile creatures who reside there seem to be overstepping their bounds and venture into the muddy border of the Noman-lands.  You should thin their numbers so they cannot spread any further.
Destroy creatures from the Dead Marshes while scouting in the Noman-lands.
Creatures from the Dead Marshes have ventured into the muddy border of the Noman-lands.\n\nYou should destroy any of these creatures you find while scouting in the Noman-lands.

'The Dead Marshes lie just beyond the Noman-Lands. Have you seen them, [placeholder]? They are a cursed place, where the dead of a great, long-ago battle still lie. The foul creatures who live there over-step their bounds into the muddy border of the Noman-Lands. Their numbers must be thinned.'

Legolas can be found in the Camp of the Host, on the northern edge of North Ithilien.\n\nYou should talk to Legolas and tell how you have cleansed many blighted creatures from the borders of the Dead Marshes.
'The cursed creatures from the Dead Marshes would surely spread farther toward Ithilien if given the chance. Thank you for preventing their approach.'
